profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses exclusively on traditional software development tasks such as building web and mobile applications, user interfaces, and implementing security features like two-factor authentication. There is no mention of AI/ML models, generative AI, or related specialized tasks. Therefore, the role is classified as a 'Software Engineer'.
